articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Crypto bro Balina wants money to fight the SEC “on behalf of the whole crypto community.” So far, he’s raised about a grand.
articles.title: ICO Hype Man Ian Balina Launches GoFundMe to Tackle SEC Lawsuit

articles.description: Brian Trunzo, metaverse lead at Polygon Studios, tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 why he's bullish on metaverse fashion, how big brands are thinking about it, why the future of NFTs will be in gaming and not "right-click save JPEGs," and why he doesn't think the visual graphics of the metaverse need to dramatically improve necessarily.
articles.title: Polygon Studios Metaverse Lead: JPEGs Are 'Not the Future of Web3 and NFTs'

articles.author: Ziwang
articles.description: Telefónica continues its move into crypto which already includes an NFT market and token, plus partnerships with Qualcomm, Unity, and Niantic.
articles.title: Telefónica Invests $29M in Crypto Exchange, Launches Payments Pilot: Report

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Shares in Bitcoin-adjacent companies including Coinbase and Block have chalked up heavy losses at the opening bell Friday morning.
articles.title: Coinbase, Crypto Stocks Plummet as Bitcoin Trades Sideways

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Ernst & Young's global blockchain leader Paul Brody told Decrypt the company is "all-in" on public blockchains, particularly Ethereum.
articles.title: Ernst & Young Wants to Be 'The Best on Earth at Ethereum' Says Firm's Blockchain Lead

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: New reports indicate that Uniswap Labs, the development team behind the eponymous DeFi exchange, is in talks for fresh funding.
articles.title: Uniswap Labs Eyes $200M in Fresh Funding: Report

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Cloud software company MicroStrategy has advertised a new job opening for a Bitcoin Lightning Network engineer.
articles.title: MicroStrategy on Hiring Hunt for Bitcoin Lightning Network Engineer

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: In a series of text messages, Elon Musk muses over potential permutations of the social network.
articles.title: Jack Dorsey Told Elon Musk Twitter Should Be a Protocol 'Like Signal'

articles.description: Balcony DAO co-founder John Belitsky tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 how Balcony DAO is fractionalizing real estate investment using NFTs starting with 20 Third Avenue in New York City, and why it's waiting to launch its token as a registered security with the SEC.
articles.title: Balcony DAO Is Fractionalizing Investment in a Manhattan Building as an NFT

articles.description: Fantom Foundation CEO Michael Kong tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 how the Layer-1 blockchain competes with Ethereum and other chains, how it's a multi-chain future, how people misunderstood what the Ethereum merge was going to mean, and how to onboard more people into Web3.
articles.title: Fantom Foundation CEO: Multiple Blockchains Will Succeed—But Not 20 of Them

articles.description: Izzy Howell, a former core contributor at Solana derivatives protocol Cypher, tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 what she's up to now: a streetwear and lifestyle brand called PussyDAO that will soon launch Solana NFTs tied to physical apparel.
articles.title: Why Izzy Howell Left Solana Derivatives Protocol Cypher to Launch an NFT Apparel Brand

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: According to text messages revealed in legal proceedings, SBF was willing to contribute up to $5 billion toward acquiring the birdsite.
articles.title: FTX's Sam Bankman-Fried Was 'Potentially Interested' in Buying Twitter with Elon Musk, Texts Claim

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: On Decrypt’s gm podcast, Magic Eden CEO Jack Lu discussed the “paradigm shift” he sees ahead as gaming NFTs take hold.
articles.title: Why Magic Eden Is Betting on NFTs Disrupting the Gaming Industry

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Binance warned that supporting ETHW on Binance Pool does not guarantee it will list the asset.
articles.title: ETHW Surges as Binance Launches Ethereum Proof-of-Work Mining Pool

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: The first joint project will be an IP-generative ‘NFT Label Pass’ from Web3 startup Probably Nothing.
articles.title: Warner Music Group Launches Partnership with OpenSea

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Debate continued at Mainnet over the role of regulations and KYC in the crypto industry.
articles.title: 'Find a Path That Allows for Crypto Innovation': Coinbase US Policy Chief

articles.author: Andrew Hayward,Tom Farren
articles.description: Meta is letting all U.S. users connect a crypto wallet and display owned NFTs on either social app.
articles.title: Facebook, Instagram Users in US Can Now Share Ethereum, Flow and Polygon NFTs

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The billionaire hedge fund manager thinks the "speculative bubble" has burst—and investors are moving on.
articles.title: Citadel's Ken Griffin: Investors Leaving Bitcoin, NFTs and Meme Stocks Is Good for Economy

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Star Atlas just rolled out its first playable demo, plus its developer released tools to help other studios bring games to Solana.
articles.title: Solana NFT Game Star Atlas Launches Playable Demo on Epic Games Store

articles.author: Will McCurdy
articles.description: Chanos pointed to Coinbase’s high operating costs and questioned whether the exchange could thrive in an environment of high-interest rates.
articles.title: Coinbase Embodies ‘Predatory Junkyard That Is Crypto’: Enron Short-Seller Jim Chanos

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The ongoing crypto winter is the best time to build and invest, according to the San Francisco venture firm Framework Ventures.
articles.title: Crypto Gaming Will 'Bring 100 Million People Into Web3': Framework Ventures Co-Founder

articles.author: Tom Farren
articles.description: Crypto.com is now the second crypto exchange after Coinbase to be targeted by the hacking group Lazarus’ macOS malware scam.
articles.title: Crypto.com Targeted in Latest Round of Lazarus Group's Fake Job Scams

articles.author: Alys Key
articles.description: A new collaboration between BNV, Weinsanto, and Lightsum marked another step into Web3 for the high-end fashion world.
articles.title: BNV Takes Paris Fashion Week Into the Metaverse With K-Pop Group Lightsum

articles.author: Ziwang
articles.description: Behnam argued that Bitcoin could soar in a regulated market where institutional investors feel more comfortable wading into the industry.
articles.title: CFTC Chair Says Crypto Regulations Could Double Bitcoin Price

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The SEC alleges that Hydrogen has been involved in unregistered offers and sales of  securities in the form of its Hydro token.
articles.title: SEC Charges Crypto Firm Hydrogen Technology With Market Manipulation, Selling Unregistered Securities

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Schmidt also said that if Chainlink can scale, it will be “a major contribution” to the tech industry.
articles.title: Ethereum Merge Shows Crypto Is 'Getting Its Act Together': Eric Schmidt

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: It’s the fourth-highest CryptoPunks sale when measured in ETH, and a surprising pickup in a time of declining NFT sales.
articles.title: Someone Just Paid $4.5M for a CryptoPunks Ethereum NFT Despite Bear Market

articles.description: Meghan Heintz, data scientist at Dune Analytics, tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 how Dune works, how its user-created data dashboards have a social element, the surprising benefit of the crypto bear market, and what she says to crypto skeptics.
articles.title: Meghan Heintz of Dune Analytics: Crypto Bear Market Makes the Scammers Move On

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: Binance will no longer support competing stablecoins, including USDC, on its exchange. USDC’s market cap is down 5% since the announcement.
articles.title: Stablecoin Markets Shift as Binance Begins USDC Conversions

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: The company also announced a Cross-Chain Transfer Protocol to streamline the movement of USDC across networks.
articles.title: Circle Expands USDC Stablecoin Support to Five New Blockchains

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Richard Widmann, the head of strategy, Cloud, and Web3 at Google, told Decrypt he believes in a decentralized, multichain future.
articles.title: Google Web3 Lead Says Google Cloud Is a 'Layer Zero' for Crypto

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Latin America’s biggest crypto exchange needs to give the Brazilian Securities and Exchange Commission information on tokens it issued.
articles.title: Brazil’s Securities Regulator Targets Mercado Bitcoin Over Token Sale

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The Ethereum-based digital asset management platform airdropped 50 million tokens in a bid to decentralize the community.
articles.title: Gnosis Safe Launches SafeDAO, Safe Token

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Tyler Hobbs, one of the best-known generative art creators, dropped his latest NFT project to eager collectors today.
articles.title: Art Blocks Fidenza Creator Sells $17M of Ethereum NFTs Amid Market Slump

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: As competition grows to make Ethereum faster and more scalable, Offchain Labs CEO Stephen Goldfeder offers a bit of advice.
articles.title: Scaling Ethereum? Arbitrum Co-Founder Says Projects Should Consider 3 'Critical' Points

articles.author: Ziwang
articles.description: Coinbase Cloud and Chainlink Labs teamed up to launch pricing feeds for the floor price of blue-chip NFTs, opening new use cases for jpegs.
articles.title: Coinbase Cloud, Chainlink Launch Price Oracles for NFT Floor Pricing

articles.description: Prasanna Loganathar is the head of engineering at Cake DeFi, which is built atop DeFi Chain, a proof-of-stake network for dapps built on a fork of the Bitcoin blockchain. He tells Decrypt’s Jason Nelson in our Decrypting Mainnet booth at Mainnet 2022 (sponsored by DeFi Chain) about how DeFi Chain works, how it's possible to layer proof-of-stake on top of Bitcoin, and the biggest misconceptions about DeFi that he'd like to see go away in 2023.
articles.title: Prasanna Loganathar of Cake DeFi: Biggest Misconception About Crypto Is It's Less Safe Than TradFi

articles.author: Alys Key
articles.description: Authorities in South Korea are reportedly seeking to freeze over $60 million in Bitcoin with ties to Do Kwon and the collapsed Terra project.
articles.title: Do Kwon, Luna Foundation Guard Deny Link to $62M in Bitcoin Sought by Authorities

articles.author: Decrypt Staff
articles.description: The Crypties will honor Web3’s brightest and boldest innovators this November during Art Basel Miami.
articles.title: Web3 Gets Its Signature Awards Ceremony: Decrypt Studios Launches The Crypties

articles.author: Adriana Hamacher
articles.description: At SmartCon 2022, Chainlink Co-founder Sergey Nazarov unveils plans to launch staking in December, plus a new economic model for the Web3 services platform.
articles.title: Chainlink Announces Staking Plans, Aiming to Be AWS of Web3

articles.author: Ben Munster
articles.description: In the wake of the merge, miserable former Ethereum miners are putting their dusty GPUs to new uses—like heating their homes.
articles.title: What You Can Do With Your Old Ethereum Mining Rigs

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The creators of the Anchor development framework for Solana are launching Backpack, a “first-of-its-kind” wallet supporting executable NFTs.
articles.title: FTX, Jump Crypto Lead $20M Funding in Solana Development Framework Coral

articles.author: Sujith Somraaj
articles.description: Bitcoin and Ethereum plummeted amid continued market volatility, bringing the industry back below $1 trillion.
articles.title: Bitcoin and Ethereum Plummet 8%, Erasing Tuesday's Bullish Gains

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: FTX founder and CEO Sam Bankman-Fried is reportedly eyeing a bid for the assets of the embattled crypto lending firm Celsius.
articles.title: Sam Bankman-Fried May Scoop Up Bankrupt Celsius' Assets: Report

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Ribbon Finance’s exchange lets users trade Ethereum options on-chain. The launch is the latest in a suite of structured financial products.
articles.title: DeFi Derivatives Protocol Ribbon Finance Launches Options Exchange on Ethereum

articles.description: Polygon co-founder Mihailo Bjelics tells Decrypt's Liam Kelly and Kate Irwin in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 about why Polygon zkEVM will be the future of Ethereum scaling, how Polygon is "an un-opinionated platform" and how the Ethereum merge affected Polygon.
articles.title: Polygon Co-Founder Talks Imminent Launch of zkEVM at Mainnet 2022

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Audius CEO and EDM fan Roneil Rumburg says he isn’t fazed by the bear market.
articles.title: How Web3 Music Platform Audius Hit 7.5 Million Monthly Users

articles.description: Framework Ventures co-founder Michael Anderson told Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Jason Nelson in our Decrypting Mainnet booth at Messari Mainnet 2022 why Framework is so bullish on blockchain gaming, NFTs in games, and how that's positioned to be the category that brings crypto to mainstream consumers.
articles.title: Framework Ventures Co-Founder: Gaming Is Going to Bring 100 Million New People Into Web3

articles.description: Jonas Surmann, ambassador for DeFi Chain, sponsor of the Decrypting Mainnet booth at Messari Mainnet 2022, tells Decrypt’s Dan Roberts and Sander Lutz about why DeFi will weather the crypto winter, how DeFi Chain is building decentralized apps on top of the Bitcoin blockchain, and what could happen with regulation if the SEC views most DeFi tokens as securities.
articles.title: Jonas Surmann of DeFi Chain at Mainnet 2022: How DeFi Will Weather Crypto Winter

articles.description: Microsoft's blockchain lead Yorke Rhodes tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Kate Irwin in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 about how Microsoft approaches Web3 and how it began its blockchain tooling with Ethereum but is now looking into working on other chains. "We think about it from a portfolio perspective, you're not focused on pushing one thing, you're focused on pushing a whole portfolio... we don't like to be kingmakers."
articles.title: Microsoft's Blockchain Lead: 'Developers Keep Building in a Bear Market, They Don't Stop'

articles.description: Sino Global Capital CEO Matthew Graham, a longtime crypto investor, joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 to talk about investment choices during the bear market, DeFi growth prospects, how crypto needs to do a better job of "encouraging good actors and being vocal when people are doing something not sustainable."
articles.title: Crypto Investor Matthew Graham: 'The LARPers Are Gone' Thanks to Bear Market

articles.description: Sidney Powell, co-Founder and CEO of Maple Finance, joins Decrypt's Liam Kelly and Stacy Elliott in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 to discuss its unique role in the lending space, why Bitcoin miners are willing to pay up to 20% for a loan, and how it's building the tooling to let any business spin up a crypto credit facility.
articles.title: Maple Finance CEO on Facilitating $300M in Loans to Bitcoin Miners

articles.description: Rich Widmann, the Web3 lead at Google Cloud, tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Kate Irwin in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 how Google Cloud is trying to "build a giant bridge" between Web2 and Web3, and the problem with crypto "purity tests."
articles.title: Google Cloud's Web3 Lead at Mainnet 2022: The Problem With Crypto 'Purity Tests'

articles.description: Steve Newcomb, chief product officer of zkSync, tells Decrypt's Liam Kelly in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 about why "zero knowledge" and EVM-compatibility matters so much for DeFi scaling solutions now. He also predicts the biggest crypto news of 2023 will be "the great port" to zk-proofs.
articles.title: Steve Newcomb of zkSync: 2023 Will Be 'Zero-Knowledge Season'

articles.description: Brandon Neal, COO of Euler Labs, told Decrypt's Liam Kelly and Stacy Elliott in our Decrypting Mainnet booth at Messari Mainnet 2022 about how Euler approached the Ethereum merge, how to onboard more people into crypto and DeFi, and how Euler competes with Compound and Aave, the leaders in the DeFi borrowing and lending space.
articles.title: Euler Labs COO: DeFi Lending 'Duopoly' of Compound and Aave Invites Competition

articles.description: DeFi Education Fund policy director Miller Whitehouse-Levine tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 about how DeFi in some ways "came too early for the crypto ecosystem" and that some lawmakers see it as "hocus pocus, but there's still reason for optimism. He also sees Bitcoin as "a DeFi protocol for payments."
articles.title: Miller Whitehouse-Levine of DeFi Education Fund Shares Reasons for Optimism on Crypto Regulation

articles.description: Steven Goldfeder, co-founder and CEO of Arbitrum developer Offchain Labs, tells Decrypt's Liam Kelly in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 how Arbitrum is handling its recent bug, how he thinks about competitors to Arbitrum, and how to convince DeFi users that bridging funds is safe even when there are so many hacks and security failures in the DeFi space. He also teases the "full vision" for Arbitrum since it's still in beta.
articles.title: Steven Goldfeder of Offchain Labs Talks Arbitrum Bug and Layer-2 Competition

articles.description: Hart Lambur, founder of DeFi project UMA Protocol, talks to Decrypt's Liam Kelly in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 all about what UMA does and what they have in store for the next iteration of their oracle, and how to write decentralized financial contracts.
articles.title: Meet 'Funky Crypto Finance Lab' UMA Protocol

articles.description: Alex Tapscott, co-author of the 2018 crypto book "Blockchain Revolution," talks to Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 about how big companies that in the past thought crypto wasn't "ready for primetime" are now more willing to invest in public blockchains. At the same time, he warns, "I don't want to overstate the culture shift too much."
articles.title: 'Blockchain Revolution' Author Alex Tapscott at Mainnet 2022: Big Companies Are Warming to Public Blockchains

articles.description: Paul Brody tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 why EY is "all in on public blockchains" and why any big companies that are still building private, closed blockchains don't get it.
articles.title: Ernst & Young Is 'All In on Public Blockchains': Paul Brody at Mainnet 2022
